On behalf of Microsoft Corporation, we would like to contribute a set of tests for the W3C XSLT 1.0/XPath 1.0 specifications in support of the OASIS XSLT/XPath Conformance Test Suite development.

1. The Contributor
 
Name:		Pranav Kandula
Affiliation:    Microsoft representative to the OASIS XSLT/XPATH Conformance Technical Committee
Email:          kpranav@microsoft.com

 
2. Copyright Notice
© 2003 Microsoft Corporation.  All rights reserved.
 
3. The Contribution

The Contributor hereby makes certain materials, as described below, ("the Materials") available to OASIS for use in supporting its activities. The Contributor hereby grants to OASIS a non-transferable and non-sublicenseable, nonexclusive, world-wide, royalty free license under any owned copyrights in the Materials to copy, publish and distribute the Materials in whole or in part as OASIS Specification [1], as well as a right and license of the same scope to any derivative works prepared by the OASIS and based on, or incorporating all or part of the Materials.

THESE MATERIALS ARE PROVIDED "AS IS," AND COPYRIGHT HOLDER MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, OR TITLE; THAT THE CONTENTS OF THE MATERIALS ARE SUITABLE FOR ANY PURPOSE; NOR THAT THE IMPLEMENTATION OF SUCH CONTENTS WILL NOT INFRINGE ANY THIRD PARTY PATENTS, COPYRIGHTS, TRADEMARKS OR OTHER RIGHTS.

COPYRIGHT HOLDER WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, SPECIAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF ANY USE OF THE MATERIALS OR THE PERFORMANCE OR IMPLEMENTATION OF THE CONTENTS THEREOF.

The Contributor agrees that any derivative works of the Materials prepared by OASIS shall be solely owned by OASIS. The Contributor agrees that all contributed Materials when published or otherwise distributed by OASIS will be governed by OASIS Policy on Intellectual Property Rights [1]. OASIS will retain attribution of authorship and copyright ownership to the Contributors. Whenever modifications are made to the Materials, this fact, and the nature of the modifications, will be clearly signaled in the distributed version thereof. OASIS makes no a-priori commitment to support or distribute the Materials.

 
4. The Materials

The materials covered by this agreement are as follows: 
          - Tests for the W3C XSLT 1.0 /XPath 1.0 specifications
     
They are submitted via OASIS XSLT/XPath Conformance TC submission page
          http://www.oasis-open.org/committees/xslt/submissions.html 
 
5. OASIS IPR Policy

[1] The OASIS Policy on Intellectual Property Rights may be found at http://www.oasis-open.org/who/intellectualproperty.shtml .
